findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled can allow malicious sites to make authenticated requests and steal sensitive data from logged-in users.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials=true, which can read private page data or make authenticated API calls if user is logged into Plex.
